subject: treat people with kindness
body:
the new harry styles video, "[treat people with kindness](https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#search/%22disco+pie%22/FMfcgxmTnNvnwMXFqBNsDWWBZRGbHFlX?compose=DmwnWrRtsWBGsqmFSMfrlDjMhnQlGhgltFhHGxdNLshwhcPRsDsDWzFbWMGhtFRDknMPzknfgBpQ)," in which he dances in matching outfits with phoebe waller-bridge. 

my best surprise christmas gift for d this year, which was [a bidet toilet seat](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B006515Z76/?tag=thewire06-20&linkCode=xm2&ascsubtag=AwEAAAAAAAAAAZq5), which, even though the installation process involved a long sunday afternoon of me sitting in puddles of tepid water on our bathroom floor feeling very frustrated and at a certain point telling d "i just want to warn you that i need to scream to get this frustration out and this scream is not about you it is about the toilet" and then screaming as loud as i could, i eventually got it all together and it has made her happy. i like the bidet feature but i'm most thankful for the heated toilet seat, which is something that i never really thought about or would have found important but is quite nice during the winter!

"[accordion](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rpaonSDPw7Y)" (rip [mf doom](https://www.complex.com/music/2020/12/mf-doom-dead-49))

my best surprise christmas gifts from d this year, which were a knockoff theragun (i have spent so much time the last week power-tooling my body at the highest settings, highly recommend if you like that kind of shit!) and [an anti-fog cloth](https://www.amazon.com/JYS-TECH-Easy-Anti-Fog-Cloth/dp/B082CVL87S/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=anti-fog+cloth&qid=1609610059&sr=8-1-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEyM05CTUhCUElPVVpCJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjUxMjA0MzNDOTk4VDIwNUNCOSZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwNDY2OTM2SUJPUDhKQklRS0hEJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ==) for my glasses, which has made it possible for me to wear glasses indoors with a mask so that i am not constantly squinting my way through the grocery store.

my favorite podcaster austin walker has a [new podcast](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/a-more-civilized-age-a-clone-wars-podcast/id1545719793) about star wars (if you prefer video, some of my favorite video game streams are his [permadeath](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DuwzJYAARqI&list=PLzQtxfcc44TClTMvlRSQc3f2RppXy1Y9j) series, where he plays a game of breath of the wild with increasingly difficult constraints, like a video game _[the five obstructions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Five_Obstructions)_)

d was going to make [banana snacking cake](https://cooking.nytimes.com/recipes/1020073-banana-snacking-cake-with-salted-caramel-glaze) but realized we didn't have baking powder and so pivoted to making chocolate chip cookies. also, the new lightbulb she installed in the kitchen overhead fixture, after a year of it always being too dim.

[today in tabs](https://www.todayintabs.com/welcome) is back!!!
